lines: On your path through dangerous lands, are you?

If you need a strong hand, I might lend you my company. 

I've slain a monster or two.
And I need to reach the castle without delay.
options: Promise a place in your carriage

lines: Thank you. I shall see you on board.
If this is your decision, I must accept it. But you might regret it when you hear the knives of the first ambush.
